pullrequest.title: Made stepping boxes into bridge; confirmed that it's walkable

content.raw:
Changed the bridge to make it a bit more challenging. Keyboard teleoping across is likely not to work, however an open loop trajectory can be created such that walking across is possible.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e9bFs0BoDmY&feature=youtu.be
content.html:
Changed the bridge to make it a bit more challenging. Keyboard teleoping across is likely not to work, however an open loop trajectory can be created such that walking across is possible.
